item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 18, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Apple restricts Pebble from being awesome with iPhones (203 points | 55 comments)
3. Google to buy Wiz for $32B (150 points | 345 comments)

11. Extracting DNA from the air – DNA evidence of human occupancy in indoor premises (200 points | 59 comments)

22. Wired is dropping paywalls for FOIA-based reporting. Others should follow (346 points | 43 comments)
23. Rippling sues Deel over spying (395 points | 82 comments)
24. North Korea Launders Billions in Stolen Crypto (51 points | 11 comments)

29. So you wanna go on prem (2016) (22 points | 3 comments)
